Description:
Sanctuary in the Golf Links Estate
Offering a private and peaceful sanctuary within the beautiful and highly-revered Golf Links Estate; this expansive family home is a split-level haven comprising several spacious living zones, and leafy garden views.
Introduced by a semi-circular driveway and contemporary rendered façade, the intricate floorplan begins with a generous fireside lounge that leads through to a sunken living room which also enjoys the warmth of an open fireplace. A sunlit dining room sits adjacent to the well-appointed kitchen that boasts European appliances including a dual wall oven, 900mm gas cooktop and a dishwasher.
Zoned for family living, 2 bedrooms plus the master (WIR) with ensuite reside alongside the renovated main bathroom that features quality tapware, separate bath, shower and a stone vanity. Further accommodation is supplied upstairs where you will discover the 4th bedroom that includes built-in robes.
Travel downstairs to the light-bathed rumpus room which flows out to an exceptional alfresco area. Featuring walls of sliding weather screens to create a year-round living space, you can entertain in comfort and style. The rear garden is a tranquil oasis, providing lush lawn, established gardens and a solar-heated Ozone pool bordered by a decked pergola and pool house.
Ducted heating, evaporative cooling, ducted vacuum system, garden shed, water tank, tandem carport and a secure single garage complete the home.
Walking distance to Mooroolbark Shops and Station, close to Croydon Main Street, Maroondah Village shops, Ruskin Park Primary School, Yarra Valley Grammar School, Luther College, Wyreena Community Arts Centre, Eastland and EastLink.

Description:
Tri-Level Haven in a Tranquil Enclave
Secure your place in one of Heathmont's most exclusive enclaves, with this elegant family home offering peace, solitude and space in a tranquil setting that abuts the Dandenong Creek Trail.
Manicured gardens and a meticulously presented interior will immediately engage the senses, with a sprawling tri-level floorplan that is perfectly layered for the growing family.
Highlighted by hardwood timber floorboards, sash bay windows and stylish contemporary upgrades, it flaunts a formal lounge with gas feature fireplace plus an open plan family/dining domain. A centrepiece kitchen unifies the zones; containing Miele stainless steel cooking appliances, an Asko dishwasher plus generous bench and storage space. Supplying an effortless indoor-outdoor entertaining experience, a covered/lit alfresco can be accessed from here, where you can dine or recline amid beautifully tended gardens. A large lower level rumpus room with built-in bar, wood log heater and substantial storage also enjoys a seamless transition outside, allowing parents and children to relax with friends in their own private spaces.
Well configured accommodation consists of a first floor master suite with wall-to-wall built-in wardrobe storage and a contemporary en suite with heated towel rail. A study, powder room and laundry complete the floorplan, enriched with the inclusion of: hydronic wall heating, evaporative cooling, ceiling fans, solar hot water, 3kw solar power system, a double carport plus additional bitumen driveway parking.
A serene location completes the picture. Accessing the Dandenong Creek Trail, buses, reserves, Heathmont Train Station and Shopping Village on foot. Only a short commute to primary schools, Heathmont and Aquinas Colleges, Tintern Grammar, recreational facilities, Eastland and EastLink.
